title: Élie Brousse
text:
Élie Brousse (28 August 1921 – 2 July 2019) was a French <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> player for <a href="Roanne%20XIII">Roanne</a>, <a href="Marseille%20XIII">Marseille</a> and <a href="Lyon%20Villeurbanne">Lyon Villeurbanne</a> in the <a href="French%20rugby%20league%20championship">French rugby league championship</a> competition. His position of choice was as a .
Brousse featured in the <a href="1951%20French%20rugby%20league%20tour%20of%20Australia%20and%20New%20Zealand">1951 French rugby league tour of Australia and New Zealand</a>, Les Chanticleers first such tour, during which they lost only 4 of their 28 games.
